text: '''''' Mawkanin, United States National Geospatial-Intelligence Agency is a large village in Ye Township in Mawlamyine District in the Mon State of southern Myanmar. Mawkanin is on the coastal plain and on the coastal highway (Route 8), about east of the town of Lamaing.Burma 1:250,000 topographic map, Series U542, ND 47-02 Ye U.S. Army Map Service, December 1959pyae talk who are you # * ''''' ==Notes== ==External links== * "Mawkanin Map — Satellite Images of Mawkanin" Maplandia World Gazetteer Category:Populated places in Mon State
title: Mawkanin
